document.full_text: software maker novell inc can proceed with a long-running antitrust lawsuit against microsoft corp after an appeals court reversed a lower court's summary judgment in favor of microsoft.
document.title: novell wins appeal in microsoft antitrust lawsuit
lines_and_colors: software maker novell inc can proceed with a long-running antitrust lawsuit against microsoft corp after an appeals court reversed a lower court's summary judgment in favor of microsoft.
